summary: A group of Calcutta city slickers, including the well-off Asim (Soumitra Chatterjee), the meek Sanjoy (Subhendu Chatterjee) and the brutish Hari (Samit Bhanja), head out for a weekend in the wilderness.
cast: Sharmila Tagore|Kaberi Bose|Simi Garewal|Soumitra Chatterjee|Subhendu Chatterjee|Rabi Ghosh|Samit Bhanja|Pahadi Sanyal|Premashish Sen|Samar Nag|Khairatilal Lahori|Dibyendu Chatterjee|Aparna Sen
title: Aranyer Din Ratri
